collection:
## PodGPT Privacy Policy

This privacy policy outlines how PodGPT collects, uses, protects, and shares
information gathered through our service.

### Information Collection and Use

When you use our service, we collect the URL you provide from podcast players.

Our backend service downloads the audio file associated with this URL for
summarization purposes.

This
service does not have access to any other data than the audio file of the
content you submit to PodGPT.

### User Consent

By using our service, you consent to the collection, processing, and use of
data as described in this policy.

## PodGPT Privacy Policy

This privacy policy outlines how PodGPT collects, uses, protects, and shares
information gathered through our service.

### Third-Party Data Sharing and Transcription Services

We partner with a third-party service to aid with audio processing.
